com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.listeners

Class SCUISessionChangeData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.listeners.SCUISessionChangeData

  • public class SCUISessionChangeData
extends java.lang.Object
    SCUISessionChangeData is used by SCUISessionChangeListener to restore all the attributes in HttpSession and LocalSession in the new Session. rasrinivasan

      • putInSessionMap

        public void putInSessionMap(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.Object value)
        Associates specified key to the given value in the session map. If the key already exists in the map it is replaced. key is of the type String value is a Java Object

      • putAllInSessionMap

        public void putAllInSessionMap(java.util.HashMap sessionMap)
        Copies all of the mapping from the given map into the sessionMap. The contents of the existing sesssionMap are not lost. If the key already exists in the map it is replaced. sessionMap is of the type HashMap

      • putInLocalSessionMap

        public void putInLocalSessionMap(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.lang.Object value)
        Associates specified key to the given value in the localSessionMap. If the key already exists in the map it is replaced. key is of the type String value is a Java Object

      • putAllInLocalSessionMap

        public void putAllInLocalSessionMap(java.util.HashMap localSessionMap)
        Copies all of the mapping from the given map into the localSessionMap. The contents of the existing localSessionMap are not lost. If the key already exists in the map it is replaced. localSessionMap is of the type HashMap
